Example of Page Header:

```js
<PageHeader>
  <PageHeaderPrevious />
  <PageHeaderTitle>Page Title</PageHeaderTitle>
  <PageHeaderSubtitleText>Page SubTitle</PageHeaderSubtitleText>
  <PageHeaderActions>
    <PageHeaderAction raised>Cancel</PageHeaderAction>
    <PageHeaderAction primary raised>
      Save
    </PageHeaderAction>
  </PageHeaderActions>
</PageHeader>
```

Exmaple of Page Header with Tabs:

```js
<PageHeader>
  <PageHeaderTitle>Page Title</PageHeaderTitle>
  <PageHeaderTabs>
    <PageHeaderTab>Tab 1</PageHeaderTab>
    <PageHeaderTab>Tab 2</PageHeaderTab>
    <PageHeaderTab>Tab 3</PageHeaderTab>
  </PageHeaderTabs>
</PageHeader>
```

Exmaple of Page Header with Custom Content:

```js
<PageHeader>
  <PageHeaderTitle>Page Title</PageHeaderTitle>
  <PageHeaderActions>
    <PageHeaderAction raised>Cancel</PageHeaderAction>
    <PageHeaderAction raised primary>
      Save
    </PageHeaderAction>
  </PageHeaderActions>
  <LayoutGrid nested>
    <LayoutGridCell span={6}>
      <TextField label="Field 1" fullWidth />
    </LayoutGridCell>
    <LayoutGridCell span={6}>
      <TextField label="Field 2" fullWidth />
    </LayoutGridCell>
  </LayoutGrid>
</PageHeader>
```
